DOC.brief_summary: With epidemic obesity diabetes grow around world , Kochujang ( KCJ ) may potentially effective prevent treat obesity cardiovascular risk proven human . However , human trial still report KCJ supplementation . In present study , investigate hypothesis KCJ supplementation decrease body fat improve blood lipid profile overweight adult .
DOC.brief_title: Kochujang , Fermented Soybean-based Red Pepper Paste , Decreases Visceral Fat Improves Blood Lipid Profiles Overweight Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate efficacy KCJ supplementation anthropometric parameter , visceral fat/subcutaneous fat , blood lipid profile overweight subject . Sixty overweight subject BMI > 25 kg/m2 waist-hip-ratio ( WHR ) ≥ 0.90 men ≥ 0.85 woman randomly assign either KCJ supplement ( n=30 , 32 g/day ) placebo ( n=30 , 32 g/day ) group 12 week .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25kg/m2 2 ) WaistHip Ratio ( WHR ) : WHR > 0.90 ( male ) , WHR > 0.85 ( female ) lipid metabolic disorder > 10 % change body weight past 3 month Cardiovascular disease arrhythmia , heart failure , myocardial infarction , wear pacemaker Allergy hypersensitivity ingredient test product History reaction experimental product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Abnormal hepatic liver function , renal disease acute chronic renal failure , nephrotic syndrome Use antipsychosis drug therapy within 2 month Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study History alcohol substance abuse Pregnancy breastfeeding
